verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with his household: <S%H1004><s%>
<S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>
<S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%>
<S%H1835>Dan<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> from the <S%H3409>loins<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> were <S%H7657>seventy<s%> in <S%H5315>number,<s%> but <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was [already] in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that generation.

But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H8317>increased<s%> <S%H8317>greatly,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and <S%H6105>became<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6105>mighty,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with them.
Now a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we.

<S%H3051>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H2449>deal<s%> <S%H2449>wisely<s%> with them, <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H7235>multiply<s%> and in the <S%H1961>event<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7122><s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3254>join<s%> themselves to those <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> us, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against us, and <S%H5927>depart<s%> from the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

So they <S%H7760>appointed<s%> <S%H8269>taskmasters<s%> <S%H4522><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them with <S%H5450>hard<s%> <S%H5450>labor.<s%> And they <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4543>storage<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H6619>Pithom<s%> and <S%H7486>Raamses.<s%>

But the <S%H9201>more<s%> they <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> them, the <S%H3651>more<s%> they <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> and the <S%H3651>more<s%> they <S%H6555>spread<s%> out, so that they were in <S%H6973>dread<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> compelled the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5647>labor<s%> <S%H6531>rigorously;<s%>

and they <S%H4843>made<s%> their <S%H9132>lives<s%> <S%H4843>bitter<s%> with <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>labor<s%> in <S%H2563>mortar<s%> and <S%H3843>bricks<s%> and at <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H5656>labor<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>labors<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6531>rigorously<s%> <S%H5647>imposed<s%> on them.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H3205>midwives,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> was <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H8236>Shiphrah,<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> was <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H6326>Puah;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "When you are helping the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>women<s%> to <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> [them] upon the <S%H70>birthstool,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it is a <S%H1121>son,<s%> then you shall <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> it is a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> then she shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>"

But the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and did not <S%H6213>do<s%> as the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had <S%H1696>commanded<s%> them, but let the <S%H3206>boys<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3205>midwives,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4069>"Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and let the <S%H3206>boys<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>?"

And the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>women<s%> are not as the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H802>women;<s%> for they are <S%H2422>vigorous,<s%> and they <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H935>can<s%> <S%H935>get<s%> to them."
So <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3190>good<s%> to the <S%H3205>midwives,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and <S%H6105>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>mighty.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> that He <S%H6213>established<s%> <S%H1004>households<s%> for them.

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> who is <S%H3209>born<s%> you are to <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> you are to <S%H2421>keep<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>"
